name: Panik at le Disco!
description:
Using the theme of "70s Retro" this game is an unfinished Rhythm Beat em up where attacking on the beat yields new combos and new types of attacks

Credits:

-Game created designed and programed by Steven Silverstein

-Disco Diva protagonist model created by Steven Silverstein with assistance from Fuzzy<3 of Kc-mm.com 

Music by Steven Silverstein and Autumn Leilani  (Autumnleilani.com and Autumnleilani on instagram)

Assets used:

 Invector Melee Manager by Invector Studios, Koreographer Professional Edition music Manager by Sonic Bloom, Glowing Musrooms by False Wisps Studios, OrientalDualBlade & Rapier anim by WeMakeTheGame, Creepy Pumpkin Monster by WOXEC, DiscoNighclub by Rivermill Studios, Zombie model & Thriller anims by Mixamo.com,  Mystic fire effect by Hovl Studios, Rumba Macarena Soulspin and Breakdance anims by Mixamo.com, and 

all other assets created by Steven Silverstein via Blender, Rigged via Mixamo.com, and imported using Unity game engine
